name: cwmsjs
description: CWMS Data API Library for JavaScript created with OpenAPI generator in TypeScript for use with browser webapps
author: USACE,HEC,CWMS,OpenApi Contributors

scripts.deploy: npm run openapi && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.openapi: npm run clean && openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript -o ./src -i cwms-swagger.json -c openapi.config.json && npm run build || npm run moveDocs
scripts.clean: shx mkdir -p ./src && shx rm -r ./src && shx mkdir -p ./src/docs && shx rm -r ./src/docs
